summary: The performer of Twin Peaks theme Julee Cruise's experimental concert film, which opens with a short intro where a man breaks up with his girl over the phone, which devastates her. The concert is set in her nightmarish subconscious mind.
cast: Laura Dern|Nicolas Cage|Julee Cruise|Lisa Giobbi|Félix Blaska|Michael J. Anderson|André Badalamenti|John Bell|Warick Bright|Ann C. Fink|Sarah Napier|Marc B. Lorber|Tom Judson|Brian Keane|Sebastian Stuart|Leasen Beth Almquist|Nicole Burdette|Michelle Cote|Elena Ferrante|Brandace Hope|Kathryn Humphrey|Anne Padden Jubb|Mary Jo Limpert|Linda Russo|Jane Sussin
keywords: break up|break up over the phone|musical performance|stage|strobe light
title: Industrial Symphony No. 1: The Dream of the Brokenhearted
